div.p: Possibly the Spiegler whom Hans Weisse in August 1912 visited in Pontresina, Switzerland, and regarded as a close personal friend (OJ 15/16, [8] : August 10, 1912). Moriz Violin, Bruno Walter, Bernhard Paumgartner, Hans Weisse and Wilhelm Furtwängler were regular visitors at Spiegler's home in Vienna (Federhofer, pp. 115 and 264; diary December 1, 1919).
There is no known contact between Hans Spiegler and Schenker (who, however, received a letter from an Albert Spiegel in 1924 (OJ 14/28).
